      • selectCourse

        public void selectCourse(java.lang.String professorId,
                         java.lang.String courseId)
                  throws CourseNotFoundException,
                         CourseNotAvailableException,
                         CourseAlreadyIndicatedException
        Description copied from interface: ProfessorDaoInterface
        Method to check if the course is already alloted or not, and then to allot the course using SQL commands
        Specified by:
        selectCourse in interface ProfessorDaoInterface
        Parameters:
        professorId - unique Id to represent a professor
        courseId - unique Id to represent a course
        Throws:
        CourseNotFoundException - if course with courseId not present in the database
        CourseNotAvailableException - if course with courseId already alloted to some professor
        CourseAlreadyIndicatedException - if course already selected by professor
